review:
*** ****** ********** ** *** ** *** **** ************ * **** **** *****  My mom came into her treatment after a strong recommendation of Dr Tamanash Choudhuri of ILS saltlake, who told me that "I am giving your mom in a safe hand", journey has been started from that day. She beautifully operated the ovarian cyst through laproscopy surgery in DAMA HOSPITAL and applying her gr8 influence she reduces my bill near about 30k which I never seen before in my entire life.
Thank you Dr. Sunipa Chatterjee from the deep of my heart.

Yesterday, on 17th December we had our baby. We were consulting a different renowned female doctor but later we switched to DR. SUNIPA. Trust me, it was the right choice. She has patience to listen to her patients. She's always polite and smiling while talking to her patients even after a busy day. No matter where she is she is always available for her patients. I'm really happy to have DR. SUNIPA as my wife's Gynecologist. She's a ideal doctor. I want to recommend her to all the women who's looking for a good doctor.

I have consulted with many doctors who told me that they have to do a major operation for my ovarian cyst and yes I was very scared for that .But finally I met Dr.Sunipa Chatterjee mam who is treating me for the last 8 months .She told me not to scare about that .I'm here after 9 days and after a smooth but major operation.Now I'm totally ok . And yes there is a miracle also , when they were bringing me to  OT, I was very scared and then when I saw her face , I was really feeling very relieved, relaxed. I'm really grateful for her treatment and mental supports .We all are blessed to get you .Giving infinite stars to you .‚ò∫Ô∏è‚ù§Ô∏è

Dr. Sunipa Chatterjee is very calm and friendly to the patients. She is very efficient in her job..she is very helpful and caring person. I have developed very critical situation during the last month of my pregnancy as my BP was very high and going to preeclampsia stage suddenly..she saved my life and done emergency OT with her full medical team to save the baby and me in the wee hours of night and had taken a very good care of me post surgery and follow up..she is next to god to me.. God bless her fullest in future..
I had a wonderful experience with the doctor.she is very patient friendly & listens very carefully giving so much time to every patient which is quite unfamiliar now a days.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Dr. Sunipa Chatterjee has been awarded the excellence award as changemaker who has excelled in her profession with challenge in WOMEN'S AWARD CEREMONY at Biswa Bangla Convention Centre by Techno India Group.
Congratulations mdm üôèüôèüôèüôè

* ***** *** *** ** * *** **** * **** ** *** * ****** who can give confidence to the patient and their family. She helps with whatever options she can if you can explain your situation . She works with her team which is excellent as well.  A Dr with a human touch.
She operated my aunt 76+ with heart disease in Dec 2021
Patient family Maya Mitra
Thank you Dr Sunipa you are doing a great work.

I visited. Dr. Sunipa *** * *** *** *** ** *** ** *** **** ***** * **** **** ***** she makes you feel so comfortable that you will tell her all your problems without any hesitation.
I would recommend her to all the ladies who are looking for a good doctor .**** ** * **** **** ****** *

I have taken appointment for my friend and we had visited the hospital. Doctor was very calm and friendly with us. She had done the check up and we are 100% satisfied with their treatment. The appointment was on time and there was no waiting time in hospital and hospital staff were cooperative and responsive with us. I would like to recommend this doctor for my friends and family members also.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
